note: I’m a proud American unapologetic for our country’s culture. I’m pro Constitution A NRA lifetime member and Iraq US Army vet. I’m happily married to a wonderful lady with two young kids. Im open to ideas and political views outside my own conservative view but against socialism. I believe in hard work a hand up not a hand out. I believe in God and our lord and savior Jesus is the best leader. I wasn’t an original supporter of President Trump but I’m pleasantly surprised with him.
